title: Keto Celebrations: Low-Carb Dishes for Holidays and Special Occasions
features: 100 Low-carb recipes worth celebrating—ketogenic diet dishes for any special occasion
Whether you're hosting a holiday feast or are simply craving classic comfort foods, you can have your cake and eat a ketogenic diet, too.

is filled with 100 special-occasion recipes you know and love, but with a keto twist—from cocktails and appetizers to entrees, side dishes, and desserts. Try sweet and savory recipes like Toast-less Blueberry French Toast, Pizza Pull-Apart Bread, Slow Cooker Brisket, and Apple Pie Bites that use easy, affordable ingredients you can find at any grocery store. Get cooking tips, prep pointers, and substitution suggestions for creating crowd-pleasing dishes that make the most out of each celebration. This ketogenic diet cookbook includes:
Eat keto, be merry—Explore tips for keeping to a ketogenic diet during the holidays and while dining out, plus practical ways to "keto-fy" your family favorites.
—Explore tips for keeping to a ketogenic diet during the holidays and while dining out, plus practical ways to "keto-fy" your family favorites.
Your keto kitchen—Find a helpful guide to keto pantry staples, essential kitchen equipment, and basic cooking techniques.
—Find a helpful guide to keto pantry staples, essential kitchen equipment, and basic cooking techniques.

Celebrate year-round—Discover delicious ketogenic diet menus that make planning holiday spreads effortless, from a Mother's Day breakfast to a Dia de los Muertos feast, New Year's Day brunch, and Fourth of July picnic.
—Discover delicious ketogenic diet menus that make planning holiday spreads effortless, from a Mother's Day breakfast to a Dia de los Muertos feast, New Year's Day brunch, and Fourth of July picnic.
Create holiday favorites that stay true to your ketogenic diet without sacrificing flavor or fun—
description: “As a holistic nutritionist, I love to direct clients to cookbooks like
offers healthy alternatives to traditional favorites

. When eliminating processed foods, it is invaluable to find recipes that are not only easy to prepare but also include readily available whole-food ingredients. Mary does this seamlessly; she knows exactly what we crave and delivers a beautiful dish with ease.”

“Mary completely outdid herself with this amazing cookbook. It is absolutely beautiful and filled with so many incredible recipes. This well laid out keto cookbook totally simplifies the search for holiday meals and special occasion recipes. Mary has successfully taken
many traditional holiday dishes and transformed them into a healthier keto version
. This book has become a go-to in my kitchen.”
—Bek Davis, Chef and Cookbook Author, www.lowcarbbek.com
“Mary Alexander is the life of the party and an expert in making keto joyous, easy, and effective. So, it’s no surprise that
is filled with deliciously mouthwatering keto recipes for every occasion, that any home cook can make with ease.”
—Taffiny Elrod, Chef, Recipe Developer, Cooking Instructor, www.chefelrod.com

is the author of the popular Instagram account @KetoHabits, which she started in early 2016 to keep herself accountable on her own keto journey. Mary has lost 60-plus pounds with keto and enjoys baking, blogging, and inspiring her followers to embrace how easy, effective, and life-changing keto can be.
